title: Attack on Titan
entry: Honestly, AoT is one of the best shows I've ever watched. The way all the details and plot points come together is incredible. My favorite character is Mikasa; I mean she is such a girl boss. I am in season 4, and I have to say I am not a Yeagerist. What he is doing is wrong because he is doing the same thing that Reiner and Bertolt. I get he wants to get revenge, but he is just making Eladians look bad. But
